title: JSON如何增加悬浮字
author: 755634418a
txt_content:
- '{"text":"        新版公告","clickEvent":{"action":"open_url","value":"https://www.XXXXX.com"}}'
我想增加在新版公告悬浮字应该怎么写？

replies.author: jxudvv
replies.txt_content:
悬浮字在老版本是用命名的凋零骷髅头+马做出来的
然而1.8已经失效，而且json里没有悬浮字这个效果

replies.author: Lucky_fish0w0
replies.txt_content:
summon ArmorStand ~ ~ ~ {CustomName:"公告内容",CustomNameVisible:1b,Marker:1b,Invisible:1b,Invulnerable:1b,NoGravity:1b}复制代码
然而并不需要JSON，除非你想给她添加右键反应什么的...那请把Marker:1b去掉，然后加一个特殊的盔甲（会显示出来），右键清除tellraw网址地址....

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content: 悬浮字点不了的 放心吧

replies.author: LBL_CB
replies.txt_content: /tellraw @a {"text":"        新版公告","clickEvent":{"action":"open_url","value":"https://www.XXXXX.com"},"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":{"text":"悬浮提示","color":"dark_red"} }}复制代码
